parameters.name: ImageFormat
parameters.description:
The format in which you want to export the custom image. Valid values:

*   raw
*   vhd
*   qcow2
*   vmdk
*   vdi

Default value: raw.

parameters.name: OSSBucket
parameters.description: The OSS bucket in which you want to store the exported custom image.

parameters.name: OSSPrefix
parameters.description: The prefix for the name of the OSS object. The prefix must be 1 to 30 characters in length and can contain digits and letters.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the custom image. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RoleName
parameters.description: The name of the RAM role that you want to use to export the custom image.
